mapper.sql: id, sitename, domain, starturl, linkstr, bodytextstr, pubtimestr, sourcestr, titlestr, helpurlstr
mapper.insert: insert into Processor (id, sitename, domain, starturl, linkstr, bodytextstr, pubtimestr, sourcestr, titlestr, helpurlstr) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sitename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bodytextstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubtimestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titlestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{helpurlstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Processor set sitename = #{sitename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starturl = #{starturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkstr = #{linkstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bodytextstr = #{bodytextstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pubtimestr = #{pubtimestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcestr = #{sourcestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titlestr = #{titlestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, helpurlstr = #{helpurlstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
